00081 #ifndef NUM_ELEMENTS
00082 # ifdef __DMC__
00083 #  define NUM_ELEMENTS(ar)      (sizeof(ar) / sizeof(ar[0]))
00084 # else /* ? compiler */
00085 #  define NUM_ELEMENTS(ar)      (sizeof(ar) / sizeof(0[ar]))
00086 # endif /* compiler */
00087 #endif /* !NUM_ELEMENTS */
00088 
00089 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00090  * Linkage specifications
00091  */

00098 #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00099 # define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP      __declspec(dllimport)
00100 #elif defined(__DMC__) || \
00101       defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) || \
00102       defined(__MWERKS__) || \
00103       defined(_MSC_VER)
00104 # if defined(_MT)
00105 #  define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP     __declspec(dllimport)
00106 # else /* ? _MT */
00107 #  define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP
00108 # endif /* _MT */
00109 #else
00110 # define UNIXEM_STGCLS_IMP
00111 #endif /* compiler */
